text: type string_pointer = “string; type person = record name : string; case student: Boolean of true: (year: integer); false: (socialsecno: string_pointer) end; and assume that the variable C contains a pointer to the string “LANGUAGES". Describe the memory representation for the person record after each of the following operations: var pippo : person; pippo.student := true; pippo.year := 223344; pippo.student := true; pippo.socialsecno := C;
